au.gov.ansto.bragg.quokka.experiment.mod.name: L1=12m_L2=2m_offset_apx2p5_JM2014
au.gov.ansto.bragg.quokka.experiment.mod.initScript: # Drive attenuator to safe value driveAtt(330) # Drive detector to short position driveDet(1200,300) # Drive entrance aperture to 50 mm square driveEntRotAp(180) # Drive guide to g3 driveGuide(guideConfig.g3) # Drive entrance aperture to 180 (for guide g3) driveEntRotAp(180) #set sample ap to 2.5 mm sics.drive('apx', 0) # Drive beamstops up selBs(3) # set beamcentres sics.set('beamcenterx', 34.64) sics.set('beamcenterz', 96.64)
au.gov.ansto.bragg.quokka.experiment.mod.preTransmissionScript: # Move the beamstop out driveBsx(32, 100) # Drive attenuator to 330 driveAtt(330)
au.gov.ansto.bragg.quokka.experiment.mod.preScatteringScript: # Drive attenuator to safe value driveAtt(330) # Move the beamstop in driveBsx(32, 0) driveBsz(264)
